content: Set up the limit of unsuccessful login attempts by the user to protect the space against brute-force attacks. When the limit is reached, attempts coming from the associated IP address will be banned for specified period of time, or captcha will be requested if enabled.

comment.text: This translation key describes the description text that appears on a security setting page, explaining how brute-force protection works and its purpose in limiting unsuccessful login attempts to protect against attacks. It informs users about the action taken when the limit is reached (banning or displaying a CAPTCHA).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "brute-force attacks" is too literal. A more natural phrasing in Arabic would convey the meaning of unauthorized intrusion attempts. 'الاختراقات' (al-ikhtiraqat) means 'hacks' or 'breaches,' which is close, but not the most accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بوضع حد لمحاولات تسجيل الدخول غير الناجحة من قبل المستخدم لحماية المساحة من محاولات التسلل أو الاختراق غير المصرح بها.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "associated IP address" could be more clearly translated. 'عنوان IP المرتبط' (ʿunwān IP al-murtabiṭ) is accurate, but a more fluent rendering would emphasize the specific IP attempting the attacks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم حظر المحاولات الواردة من عنوان IP الذي يحاول التسجيل.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'captcha' is a technical term. While using the transliteration 'كلمة التحقق' is understandable, a more accessible Arabic equivalent might improve comprehension for a wider audience. Consider a phrase describing what a CAPTCHA *is*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أو سيتم طلب اختبار التحقق من أنك لست برنامجًا آليًا في حالة تمكينها.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'protect the space' is not accurately translated. 'Space' doesn't have a direct equivalent in this context. A better translation would refer to 'account' or 'system'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domeni hesab və ya sistem hesablarından qorumaq üçün istifadəçi uğursuz giriş cəhdlərinin limitini təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'banned' could be translated more precisely. 'Qadağan ediləcək' implies a complete prohibition, but the context suggests a temporary block.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limitə çatdıqdan sonra müvafiq IP ünvanından cəhdlər müəyyən müddətə dayandırılacaq

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Minor spelling issue. 'kobud güc' is correct, but 'kobud' can be written as 'kaba' for a more common tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domeni kaba güc hücumlarından qorumaq üçün...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a somewhat long sentence structure, making it slightly less readable than the English original. Consider breaking it into two sentences for improved clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte limit neúspěšných pokusů o přihlášení ze strany uživatele za účelem ochrany prostoru před útoky hrubou silou. Po dosažení limitu budou pokusy přicházející z přidružené IP adresy zakázány po zadanou dobu, nebo bude vyžadován captcha, je-li povolen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prostoru' (space) might be too broad and not the most accurate translation for what is being protected. Considering 'účet' (account) or 'systém' (system) may be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavení limitu neúspěšných pokusů o přihlášení ze strany uživatele za účelem ochrany účtu před útoky hrubou silou. Po dosažení limitu budou pokusy přicházející z přidružené IP adresy zakázány po zadanou dobu, nebo bude vyžadován captcha, je-li povolen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a semicolon (;) where a period (.) might be more appropriate, especially at the end of the second sentence.  Greek punctuation often follows English patterns, but a period feels more natural here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace ';' with '.' after 'διάστημα'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "väsytyshyökkäyksiltä" is a literal translation of "brute-force attacks" and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Finnish. A more common and fluent phrasing would be something along the lines of "raakaohjelmahyökkäyksiltä" or simply "väkisin murtautumisyrityksiltä".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'väkisin murtautumisyrityksiltä' or 'raakaohjelmahyökkäyksiltä' instead of 'väsytyshyökkäyksiltä'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'brute-force attacks' is translated as 'կոպիտ ուժի հարձակումներ'. While technically correct, a more idiomatic translation might be 'խոշնագնաց հարձակումներ' to more closely reflect the technical term's common usage in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տարածքը խոշնագնաց հարձակումներից պաշտպանելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated IP address' is translated as 'համապատասխան IP հասցե'.  A more natural translation would be 'կցված IP հասցե' or 'կից IP հասցե'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Կցված IP հասցեից եկող փորձերը կարգելվեն

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) after 'ժամանակահատվածով' which is unusual in this context.  Removing it would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Երբ սահմանաչափը հասնի, համապատասխան IP հասցեից եկող փորձերը կարգելվեն որոշակի ժամանակահատված մուտքի փորձերի սահմանը՝ տարածքը կոպիտ ուժի հարձակումներից պաշտպանելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "space" in the English content doesn't have a direct equivalent that maintains the original meaning. 'Space' refers to a digital account or service area. A better translation would convey this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공간 (space) 대신 '계정' 또는 '서비스'로 변경하는 것을 고려해 보세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated IP address' is slightly awkward in the Korean translation. While understandable, it could be phrased more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “해당 IP 주소에서 비롯된 시도” 대신 “해당 IP 주소에서의 시도” 또는 “해당 IP 주소에서 오는 시도” 로 수정하는 것을 고려해 보세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'brute-force attacks' is translated as 'ການໂຈມຕີດ້ວຍແຮງກ້າ'. While understandable, a more accurate and common translation would be 'ການໂຈມຕີແບບບ້າ ຫຼື ການໂຈມຕີແບບໃຊ້ກຳລັງ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການໂຈມຕີແບບບ້າ ຫຼື ການໂຈມຕີແບບໃຊ້ກຳລັງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated IP address' is translated as 'ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ'. A more accurate translation would be 'ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽນສົນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທີ່ຢູ່ IP ທີ່ກ່ຽນສົນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vieta' is used for 'space'. While technically correct, it's a bit awkward in this context. 'Sistēma' or 'platforma' would be more suitable for a digital space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet lietotāja neveiksmīgo pieteikšanās mēģinājumu ierobežojumu, lai aizsargātu sistēmu/platformu pret rupja spēka uzbrukumiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'interneta protokola (IP) adreses' is overly formal and lengthy. 'IP adreses' is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet lietotāja neveiksmīgo pieteikšanās mēģinājumu ierobežojumu, lai aizsargātu sistēmu/platformu pret rupja spēka uzbrukumiem. Kad limits ir sasniegts, mēģinājumi, kas nāk no IP adreses, tiks aizliegti uz noteiktu laiku vai tiks pieprasīts Captcha, ja tas ir iespējots.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de ruimte" (the space) is not the most natural translation for "the space" in this context. It would be more accurate to say "de toegang" or "het systeem".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stel de limiet in van het aantal mislukte aanmeldpogingen door de gebruiker om de toegang te beschermen tegen brute-force aanvallen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “bijbehorende IP-adres” is slightly awkward. While technically correct, a more fluent Dutch phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: het bijbehorende IP-adres wordt voor een bepaalde tijd geweigerd.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a comma (,) instead of a semicolon (;) to separate sentences, which is more common in Polish writing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the comma after 'czas' with a semicolon: '...zostaną zablokowane na określony czas; lub pojawi się kod CAPTCHA, jeśli zostanie włączony.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "prin forță brută" is a literal translation of "brute-force" and while understandable, a more natural Romanian phrasing would be "atacuri de tip forță brută" or "atacuri cu forță brută".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: atacuri de tip forță brută

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "va solicita validarea de tip captcha" is grammatically awkward. "Va solicita un captcha" or "va solicita o verificare captcha" are more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: va solicita un captcha

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "de tip captcha" after "validarea" is redundant and makes the sentence clunky.  It's better to just say "captcha".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: va solicita captcha

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "attempts coming from the associated IP address" is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation. "Попытки входа с соответствующего IP-адреса" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would emphasize attempts originating *from* a particular IP.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "Попытки входа, идущие с соответствующего IP-адреса" or "Попытки входа, совершенные с соответствующего IP-адреса".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "if enabled" is translated as "если такая функция включена". While technically correct, "если включено" would be a more concise and natural way to say it in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "если такая функция включена" to "если включено".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "අදාළ අ.ජා.කෙ. (IP) ලිපිනය" is a somewhat awkward translation of "associated IP address". It's technically correct, but reads less naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "අදාළ IP ලිපිනය" or "සබැඳි IP ලිපිනය".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of the abbreviation 'අ.ජා.කෙ.' within parentheses feels disruptive. It's understandable to include it for clarity, but visually breaks the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a footnote or separate explanation for 'IP' instead of including it within parentheses like this. Alternatively, 'IP' can be clarified earlier, or avoided altogether if context implies it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'space' in the English content is not accurately translated. 'Space' likely refers to the system or application being protected. 'Priestoru' in Slovak is better translated as 'systému' or 'aplikácie'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavenie limitu neúspešných pokusov o prihlásenie používateľa na ochranu systému/aplikácie pred útokmi hrubou silou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated IP address' is translated too literally. While understandable, 'príslušnej IP adresy' could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavenie limitu neúspešných pokusov o prihlásenie používateľa na ochranu systému/aplikácie pred útokmi hrubou silou. Po dosiahnutí limitu budú pokusy prichádzajúce z danej IP adresy na zadaný čas zakázané alebo sa bude vyžadovať captcha, ak je aktivovaná.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'napadi z vdorom' is a literal translation of 'brute-force attacks' and isn't the standard terminology in Slovenian. A more accurate translation would be 'napadi z grobo silo' or 'sile poskusi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'napadi z vdorom' with 'napadi z grobo silo' or 'sile poskusi'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'povezanega' could be improved. While grammatically correct, 'associated' is less commonly used in this context.  'Zadašnji' or 'dotični' might be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'povezanega' with 'zadašnji' or 'dotični'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'brute-force' in English instead of a Serbian equivalent. While understandable, it's preferable to use a localized term if available.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a Serbian equivalent for 'brute-force', such as 'насилни напади' or a more specific term depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'простор' (prostor) is a rather generic translation of 'space'. In the context of a system or online platform, a more appropriate word might be 'система' (sistema - system) or 'платформа' (platforma).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'простор' with 'система' or 'платформа'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'associated IP address' is not accurately translated. 'Povezana IP adresa' is technically correct, but could be more natural-sounding. It could imply the IP is directly linked to a user account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'IP adresa sa koje se pokušava prijavljivanje' or 'IP adresa koja šalje pokušaje prijavljivanja' for a more nuanced and natural translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability.  The first part of the English is quite direct and the Serbian feels a little less so.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the first part of the sentence to 'Postavite ograničenje broja neuspešnih pokušaja prijavljivanja korisnika kako biste zaštitili prostor od napada brute-force.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a colon (:) after 'Alanı brute force saldırılarına karşı korumak' which isn't typical in Turkish sentence structure. It breaks the natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'korumak'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma (,) where a period (.) might be more appropriate for a formal settings description. Specifically, after 'часу'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Установіть ліміт невдалих спроб входу користувача, щоб захистити простір від атак грубою силою. Коли ліміт буде досягнуто, спроби, що надходять із пов’язаної IP-адреси, будуть заблоковані протягом певного періоду часу. або, якщо ввімкнено, запитуватиметься капча.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '暴力攻击' (violent attacks) while technically correct, can be overly strong and potentially alarming in this context. A more suitable term emphasizing forceful attempts would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 设置登录失败次数限制，保护空间免受恶意破解尝试。 (Set login failure attempt limit to protect the space from malicious cracking attempts.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “关联 IP 地址” (associated IP address) is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be '来自该 IP 地址' (from that IP address).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 达到指定限制时，来自该 IP 地址的尝试将在所选时间段内被禁止；

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “所选时间段内被禁止” (banned within the selected time period) is slightly awkward.  A more fluid translation would be '将被禁止一段时间' (will be banned for a period of time).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 达到指定限制时，来自该 IP 地址的尝试将在一段时间内被禁止；

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The semicolon after the first sentence creates an unnatural flow. A conjunction or period would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 达到指定限制时，来自该 IP 地址的尝试将在一段时间内被禁止，如果启用，则会被请求使用验证码。
